g.text: Gestor de Servi√ßos de Help Desk
iniciates the request to add/update a field in a service draft
asks if the user pretends to use an existing draft
[if the user pretends to use an existing draft]
[if the user pretends to use create a new draft]
[until the user doesn't want to add more forms]
requests the user to insert the form's name
[until the user doesn't want to add more forms]
requests the user to insert the attribute's data (name, label, description, regex, scriptPath)
addAttribute(name, label, description, regex, scriptPath, dataType)
create(name, label, description, regex, scriptPath, dataType)
asks if there is more attribute to add to the current form
asks if there is more forms to add to the current draft
valida, apresenta os dados do servico e solicita uma confirma√ß√£o
regista o servico e informa do sucesso da opera√ß√£o
